testcase.classname: User want to add the New Employee Training records
testcase.name: Validation of creating the new user in Employee Training records - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given User launch the Employee Training url "http://10.192.190.130:3000/"...passed When User clicks on Add Training button.....................................passed And Verify user navigated to the Add Training page..........................passed And Select the project name "1".............................................passed And User enter the Employee Id "H1143"......................................passed And User enter the Employee name "Jerry"....................................passed And User enter the Course name "Playwright"................................passed And User enter the Trainer name "Naveen"....................................passed And User select the Training type "1".......................................passed And User enter the start date "09242025"....................................passed And User enter the end date "09242025"......................................passed And User select the Status "0"..............................................passed And User enter the completion percentage "50"...............................passed And User clicks on Add button...............................................passed Then User navigated to the Training Summary page............................passed
